item.title: 3 Things A Climate Scientist Learned From Jane Goodall
item.description: What a climate scientist learned from Dr. Jane Goodall.

item.title: Nobel Prize Awarded For Basic Research Into Immune Tolerance
item.description: The 2025 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine was started by three researchers for their contributions to our understanding of immune tolerance.

item.title: Rivian Chief Sounds Optimistic About His EV Trucks Despite Headwinds
item.description: The founder and CEO of electric-truck maker Rivian remains optimistic despite headwinds facing electric vehicles.

item.title: Memory Giant Lexar Announces High Speed Magnetic SSD For iPhone 17 Series
item.description: The Lexar ES5 SSD magnetically attaches to an iPhone and is available in capacities up to 4TB. It supports Apple ProRes at 4K 120fps and Samsung Pro V...

item.title: Google Suddenly Raises Trade In Prices In New Pixel 10 Giveaway
item.description: Google is building up to its Black Friday pricing with a new Pixel 10 freebie giveaway.
